mapper.select: SELECT a.UserId, a.AccountType userType, a.AccountName username, a.AccountPwd, a.AccountStatus, GROUP_CONCAT(r.RoleId) roleIds, a.HeadImage, a.NickName, u.PhoneNum, a.LastLoginTime FROM sys_account a LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.UserId = u.Id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.Id = r.UserId WHERE ACCOUNTNAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.id

SELECT a.UserId, a.AccountType userType, a.AccountName username, a.AccountPwd, a.AccountStatus, GROUP_CONCAT(r.RoleId) roleIds, a.HeadImage, a.NickName, u.PhoneNum, a.LastLoginTime FROM sys_account a LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON a.UserId = u.Id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role r ON u.Id = r.UserId WHERE a.WechatOpenId = #{userOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.id
